data.title: What Is The Cause Of Wiz Khalifa's Death - 962 Words
data.meta_description: Free Essay: Cameron Jibril Thomaz, better known as Wiz Khalifa, has signed with numerous famous record labels and won ‘best new artist" back in 2011 from the...
data.text:
Cameron Jibril Thomaz, better known as Wiz Khalifa, has signed with numerous famous record labels and won ‘best new artist" back in 2011 from the BET (BLACK ENTERTAINMENT TELEVISION) awards.

His most famous track is "See you again" which was the soundtrack for the new movie the fast and furious, also was a tribute to the death of Paul walker.

Right enough of the typical overloading boring facts malarkey lets get to the reason I'm writing this article. Wiz Khalifa has personally helped me with his music get through a rough patch in my life, his energetic and happy persona he gets across in his tracks really made me see a positive side even on the worst of days. I just used to plug my headphones in and lay all my stress out through his music …show more content…

it's not hard to see that the internet is killing people as you can just type it in google and 36,100,000 results appear in (0.52 seconds) about this subject matter. That is mad! And I personally think people need to change their approach to how they use the internet. This can be as simple as having a break up and posting a picture with another male/female to make your ex jealous, I know this happens as I have done it myself and so have all my friends. I know its just a picture but it's the fact it's on social media and all your ex's friend's can see it and then they have an opinion about it, then they tell their friends and show your ex then people start assuming things and it just goes on and on. All from a picture which was just for a little bit of attention and to make you feel better about yourself because you miss that special person. And then the ex who maybe isn't as bitter as you are, sees the picture and wishes that they were the person you were with and get upset and extremely depressed about it, and does something they shouldn't, how would you feel about yourself then? This seems like a worst case senior but this really doses happen on a daily basis as it has even happened to more than one of my friends. Therefore, leaving each and everyone of them in a worst state they were in the begging and feeling nothing but regret, all from a silly picture which they weren't even doing anything with the girl they just wanted it to look like they were for a bit of attention, (to feel better about them
